events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the Software Engineer position outlining relevant experience and skills.
We have categorized the application under the Engineering department as the role focuses on software development and coding proficiency.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the process and communicate with the candidate regarding the next stages.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated good understanding of software engineering fundamentals.
The candidate responded promptly to our screening questions and expressed enthusiasm for the technical interview phase.
We have scheduled the technical interview with our senior developers to further evaluate the candidate's coding skills.
The technical interview went very well; the candidate solved complex problems efficiently and demonstrated excellent problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate’s cultural fit and compensation expectations.
The HR interview was positive; the candidate aligns well with company values and has realistic salary expectations.
An offer has been proposed including details about salary, benefits, and joining date for the software engineer position.
The candidate has provided positive feedback on the offer and is excited about joining our engineering team.
We have received formal acceptance of the employment offer, confirming the candidate’s commitment to join the company.
The onboarding process has begun, including account setup, introductions, and initial training for the new software engineer.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate successfully integrated into the engineering team, ready to start contributing.
